mapper.sql: menu_id, navbar_id, parent_id, name, url, perms, type, icon, order_num
mapper.select: SELECT d.perms as perms FROM ((( (SELECT id FROM sys_user WHERE username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR})AS a LEFT JOIN sys_user_role AS b ON a.id = b.user_id) LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu AS c ON c.role_id = b.role_id) LEFT JOIN sys_menu AS d ON c.menu_id = d.menu_id)

SELECT DISTINCT d.* FROM ((( (SELECT id FROM sys_user WHERE username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR})AS a LEFT JOIN sys_user_role AS b ON a.id = b.user_id) LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu AS c ON c.role_id = b.role_id) LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM sys_menu WHERE type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER})AS d ON d.menu_id = c.menu_id) order by order_num
mapper.insert: insert into sys_menu (menu_id, navbar_id, parent_id, name, url, perms, type, icon, order_num) values (#{menuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{navbarId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{perms,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderNum,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.update:
update sys_menu
navbar_id = #{navbarId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
perms = #{perms,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
icon = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_num = #{orderNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where menu_id = #{menuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update sys_menu set navbar_id = #{navbarId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, perms = #{perms,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, icon = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_num = #{orderNum,jdbcType=INTEGER} where menu_id = #{menuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
